segments.text: Have you seen the news that there is a serious flood in the South ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've got to cancel my traveling plan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a pity ! I know you've been longing for it these months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The only thing I can do now is waiting for another chance .
segments.speaker: S2
